entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: Fawkes is described as an extraordinary bird by Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is mentioned throughout the passage.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends and is mentioned as holding Ginny's hand.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is another one of Harry's friends and is mentioned as having her hands held by Ron and Lockhart.

entities.name: professor lockhart
entities.description: Professor Lockhart is a character who is trying to impress others with his magical abilities.

entities.name: moaning myrtle
entities.description: Moaning Myrtle is the ghost of a student who died in the bathroom where Harry and his friends land after flying through the pipe.

entities.name: sorting hat
entities.description: The Sorting Hat is an object that is mentioned as being tucked into Harry's belt.

entities.name: sword
entities.description: A sword is mentioned as being tucked into Harry's belt along with the Sorting Hat.

entities.name: pipe
entities.description: The pipe is an object that Harry and his friends fly through to reach Moaning Myrtle's bathroom.

relationships.description: Harry holds Fawkes's tail feathers, allowing them to fly through the pipe.
Ron holds Ginny's hand as they fly through the pipe.
Harry is above Lockhart as they fly through the pipe, with Lockhart dangling below him.
Ron takes hold of the back of Harry's robes as they fly through the pipe.
